title: Piano and strings soundtrack Mask (Beautiful piano strings Loop)
description: Piano and strings  Mask  Is a beautifully Composed Piano strings track for in-game Use.
longDescription:
Cinematic piano audio demo


Only grand Piano Audio Demo






﻿note :- All the music tracks I have composed are created from scratch. My artist name is Meraj Melody. You can visit my YouTube channel to see how I create music from scratch.If you need verification of this music package and how I composed everything, I will happily provide you with a video recording of each individual music creation process. As a musician dedicated to producing original music, I ensure that I do not use any third-party samples or AI tools in my compositions. This is to preserve the originality of my work and avoid potential legal issues in the future.


I am a music composer and sound designer, and I work with a team in a small audio studio in our local market. I can guarantee you that we don't use any AI in our projects because it would destroy the originality. You can check out the preview on YouTube to see how I create music and sound effects from scratch.


Here is my music composition process:- https://youtu.be/PrynlgTWsdQ


"Due to the marketplace flooding with AI-generated content, I often get questions about whether my music is AI-generated. I am happy to provide all the necessary evidence that my music is not AI-generated content; it is fully made from scratch."

Piano and string Mask In Emotional Beautiful piano strings soundtrack music ready for In-game bgm Use. 

There are two versions of the track One is only Piano and the other one is the cinematic soundtrack. You will find a separate folder.









All tracks are composed by Meraj Melody ( Me )

By Purchasing the tracks you have the right to use in-games, software, Animation, Etc.

Commercial Rights to all kinds of content.

(YouTube content id disable )You will not receive copyright claims on YouTube when using this music, as it is not registered with YouTube's Content ID system. If you do receive a false claim, please contact me immediately.
